sentences: The informal session of the ADP took place in Bangkok, Thailand, from 30 August to 5 September 2012.
Parties convened in roundtable sessions to discuss their vision and aspirations for the ADP, the desired results of its work and how these results can be achieved.

Parties also discussed how to enhance ambition, the role of means of implementation and how to strengthen international cooperative initiatives, as well as the elements that could frame the ADP's work.
